options.content:
MTM - MDS Traffic Monitoring - Switchports

Detailed Switchport Monitoring

value.title: Details of switches and switchports in ${__value.raw}
Details of switch ${__value.raw} and its ports

targets.query: SELECT location as Location, description as "Description", oper_state as "Operational State", oper_mode as "Oper Mode", oper_speed as "Speed (G)", pc as "Member of Port-Channel", pwwn as "PWWN" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ and "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport order by time desc limit 1
SELECT switchname as "Switch Name" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND  $timeFilter order by time desc limit 1

SELECT (non_negative_difference(mean(rx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8 as "RX Traffic",(non_negative_difference(mean(tx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8 as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport

SELECT (non_negative_difference(mean(rx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8/(mean(oper_speed)*1000000000*[[fc_data_rate]]) as "RX Traffic", (non_negative_difference(mean(tx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8/(mean(oper_speed) * 1000000000*[[fc_data_rate]]) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport fill(null)
SELECT last(oper_speed) as "Max" from "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(txwait))*2.5/(elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s)*1000000) as "TxWait" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_b2b_credit_to_zero))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "RX B2B transition to 0",non_negative_difference(mean(tx_b2b_credit_to_zero))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "TX B2B transition to 0" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(credit_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "Credit Loss" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport fill(null)

SELECT mean(rx_b2b_credit_remain) as "RX B2B remaining",mean(tx_b2b_credit_remain) as "TX B2B remaining" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "TX Discards", non_negative_difference(mean(rx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "RX Discards",non_negative_difference(mean(timeout_discards))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "Timeout Discards",non_negative_difference(mean(crc))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "CRC",non_negative_difference(mean(fec_corrected))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "FEC Corrected",non_negative_difference(mean(fec_uncorrected))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "FEC Uncorrected" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(itw))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "ITW",non_negative_difference(mean(link_failures))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "Link Failure",non_negative_difference(mean(rx_lr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "RX LR",non_negative_difference(mean(tx_lr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "TX LR",non_negative_difference(mean(rx_lrr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "RX LRR" ,non_negative_difference(mean(tx_lrr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "TX LRR" ,non_negative_difference(mean(signal_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "Signal Loss",non_negative_difference(mean(sync_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "Sync Loss"   FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport fill(null)

SELECT mean(sfp_current) as "SFP Current" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]]),switchport fill(null)

SELECT mean(sfp_voltage) as "SFP Voltage"  FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]]),switchport fill(null)

SELECT mean(sfp_temperature) as "SFP Temperature" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]]),switchport fill(null)

SELECT mean(sfp_tx_pwr) as "SFP TX PWR", mean(sfp_rx_pwr) as "SFP RX PWR" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]]),switchport fill(null)

SELECT (non_negative_difference(mean(rx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8 as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport fill(null)

SELECT (non_negative_difference(mean(rx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8 as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]]*20),switch,switchport fill(null)

SELECT (non_negative_difference(mean(tx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8 as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "switchport" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switchport fill(null)

SELECT (non_negative_difference(mean(tx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8 as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" =~ /^$switchport$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]]*20),switch,switchport fill(null)

panels.title: Port-Channel traffic distribution (Must Select a port-channel interface from Switch Port menu)

list.label: Switch
list.name: switch
list.query: show tag values from  "$db"."$rp"."Switches" with key=switch  WHERE $timeFilter

list.label: Switch Port
list.name: switchport
list.query: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" with key=switchport where switch =~ /$switch/ and $timeFilter

list.name: min_interval
list.query: select last(elapsed) from (select elapsed(switchname,1s) from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switch =~ /$switch/ and $timeFilter)
